1:
--------------------
<Text: Immanuel Lutheran Church (Valparaiso, Indiana):  The church building was erected in 1891 by Henry Lemster and his son Charles.>

<Text: Immanuel Lutheran Church (Valparaiso, Indiana):  A fire gutted the building in 1975, marks of which can still be seen on the altar and pews.>
